Posts.Content: Hi Clare, I had a mastectomy and DIEP reconstruction on August 6th it all went well and I was given permission to fly on the 20th September exactly 6 weeks and 4 days after surgery. It all depends if you are a quick healer and the scars aren't still open. I hope all goes well and you get on that well deserved holiday. xxx

Posts.Content: Hi, I'm six weeks after my surgery and still very swollen under the arm and over the breast but asked yesterday and was told it could take up to three - six months to go down and for the breast to start taking a proper shape, Keep positive i'm sure you will start to see a difference very soon xxxx
